definition: Heping district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning/Hoping township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
Heping or Peace district (of many towns)/Heping district of Tianjin municipality 天津市[Tian1 jin1 shi4]/Heping district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning
peaceful coexistence of nations, societies etc
Zhou Enlai's Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence/1954 Panchsheel series of agreements between PRC and India
pinyin: he2 ping2 gong4 chu3 wu3 xiang4 yuan2 ze2

definition: Heping county in Heyuan 河源[He2 yuan2], Guangdong

sentences.english: One should do his best for the cause of world peace.
sentences.chinese: 一小我应该为世界和平事业尽最大悉力。

sentences.english: Peace and stability in the South China Sea is simply indispensable when we talk about development of countries in the region.
sentences.chinese: 南海和平稳定是本地区各国发展的必要条件。

sentences.english: China always adheres to the road of peaceful development.
sentences.chinese: 中国始终坚持走和平发展道路。

sentences.english: Only human art or science or art, human contrivance, can bring about peace.
sentences.chinese: 只有人类的艺术或科学，人类的发明，能够带来和平。

sentences.english: Even so, the peace activists of the day reacted to the news of his Nobel Prize with mortification.
sentences.chinese: 当时的和平活动家们也对他成为诺奖得主感到耻辱。

sentences.english: So, dear young people, please speak up for peace.
sentences.chinese: 所以，亲爱的青年朋友，请为和平仗义执言。

sentences.english: The Boskops coexisted with our Homo sapiens forebears.
sentences.chinese: 博斯科普人曾与我们的智人祖先和平共处。

sentences.english: During the war, my family prayed every day for peace.
sentences.chinese: 在战争期间，我的家人每天祈祷，冀求和平。

sentences.english: She is in a different city as a factory worker.
sentences.chinese: 她的妈妈阮和平在另一座城市的工厂打工。

sentences.english: He himself is a perennial Nobel also-ran.
sentences.chinese: 他自己就长年是诺贝尔和平奖落选者。

sentences.english: We stand together to advance peace.
sentences.chinese: 我们站在一起推进和平。

sentences.english: The promoters figured "peace" would link the anti-war sentiment to the rock concert.
sentences.chinese: 促进者们表示，“和平”将反战情绪带进摇滚音乐会。

sentences.english: Hopes of a peace settlement faded.
sentences.chinese: 和平解决的希望成为泡影。

sentences.english: We must strive for peace with ISIS, it's the only way.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须于伊希斯争取和平，这是唯一的出路。

sentences.english: You deserve long and happy life and peace.
sentences.chinese: 你们应得到长而快乐的生活和和平。
